FuncDef: This command configures an IPv4 filter ID that is applied to packets egressing the VPRN R-VPLS interface. The filter overrides the existing egress IPv4 filter applied to VPLS service endpoints such as SAPs or SDPs, if configured.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP filter ID. This parameter is required when executing the v4- routed-override-filter command. The specified filter ID must exist as an IPv4 filter within the system or the override command fails.
